item.title: Drone "narco sub" — equipped with Starlink antenna — seized for first time
item.description: It is the first reported discovery in South American waters of an unmanned semisubmersible vessel, Colombia's navy said.

item.title: Hiring surged in June, shrugging off economic worries
item.description: Employers across the U.S. added 147,000 jobs in June, while the unemployment rate fell to 4.1%.
